metadata.title: CVE-2014-8242 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: librsync before 1.0.0 uses a truncated MD4 checksum to match blocks, whichmakes it easier for remote attackers to modify transmitted data via abirthday attack.

criterions.comment: librsync: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
